sys_properties_category.title:
Table Saw Details and System Properties

Table Saw is a great tool for the ServiceNow UI/UX developer - it handles data transport, filtering, and binding, so you can focus on the presentation of your data. Built on AngularJS and Bootstrap CSS, Table Saw makes it easy to present data from a particular table, filter that data, and show detailed views for specific records, all in the UI you create. Furthermore, the data is bound in near-real-time, so you can instantly demonstrate changes to data without a page refresh.

Table Saw simplifies the process of creating a custom data view in ServiceNow while offering an unparalleled level of customizability and user experience. Check out the sample data and renderers for ideas on how to build your own table views.

Note: Table Saw does not honor ACLs or other record permissions restrictions - you are responsible for configuring table views appropriate for your user groups.
